data.title: B Site to B Main Cove
data.description: A good Cove to throw when defusing the spike that forces an enemy to break it or push through it to challenge you.

data.title: A Drop to A Dish Cascade
data.description: A good Cascade to support your team pushing into A Dish.

data.title: A Ropes to A Door Cascade
data.description: A good Cascade to use when enemies are pushing up A Main toward A Door.

data.title: A Rope to B Tree High Tide
data.description: A good High Tide to block enemies pushing up B Tree allowing your team to play around the wall.

data.title: B Site Retake High Tide
data.description: Use this High Tide to retake B Site with your team.

data.title: Cascade to take Space in A Main at Round Start
data.description: Use this Cascade at the start of the round to take space in A Main.

data.title: A Site Retake High Tide from A Rope
data.description: Use this High Tide to retake A Site with your team.
